thread.title: Tucker Carlson interviews professor who struggled ‘not to vomit’ over show of gratitude for soldier
thread.title_full: Tucker Carlson interviews professor who struggled ‘not to vomit’ over show of gratitude for soldier

author: William A.
title: Tucker Carlson interviews professor who struggled ‘not to vomit’ over show of gratitude for soldier
text:
Tucker Carlson interviews professor who struggled ‘not to vomit’ over show of gratitude for soldier Posted at 10:07 pm on March 30, 2017 by William A. 
On Thursday’s show, Tucker Carlson interviewed Drexel University associate professor George Ciccariello-Maher. Twitchy readers will remember our post about him from earlier this week: ‘White Genocide’ Drexel prof says he struggled ‘not to vomit’ over soldier in uniform https://t.co/UI9KF6tLh7 
— Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) March 29, 2017 
Carlson debated Ciccariello-Maher about disruptions of speeches by Charles Murray and his previous comments: George Ciccariello-Maher: "Universities are actually spaces for rational ideas, for arguments that are based in fact and evidence." #Tucker pic.twitter.com/Kke50NVsXO 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) March 31, 2017 "White Genocide" professor says he tried not to vomit when someone gave up their plane seat for a soldier. pic.twitter.com/dGlVshCaeN 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) March 31, 2017 
Here’s the video of their exchange: 'White genocide' prof: No place on campus for racist Murray https://t.co/gjd1GVYDQc 
— William Amos (@WilliamAmos) March 31, 2017 Trending
